param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: Referencia al moniker que se va a buscar en la tabla ROT.

param.name: ppunkObject
param.span: Contiene el objeto en ejecución solicitado, si la devolución es correcta.

span.span: On successful return, contains the requested running object.

span.span: Returns the registered object if the supplied object name is registered as running.

public: void NoteChangeTime(int dwRegister, System::Runtime::InteropServices::FILETIME % pfiletime);

param.name: dwRegister
param.span: Entrada de la tabla ROT correspondiente al objeto modificado.

span.span: The ROT entry of the changed object.

param.name: pfiletime
param.span: Referencia a la hora a la que el objeto se modificó por última vez.

span.span: Reference to the object's last change time.

summary.span: Anota la hora a la que se ha modificado un objeto determinado para que pueda notificar la hora de modificación adecuada.

span.span: Makes a note of the time that a particular object has changed so can report an appropriate change time.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Register (int grfFlags, object punkObject, System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, out int pdwRegister);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Register(int32 grfFlags, object punkObject, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, [out] int32& pdwRegister) cil managed
Public Sub Register (grfFlags As Integer, punkObject As Object, pmkObjectName As UCOMIMoniker, ByRef pdwRegister As Integer)
public: void Register(int grfFlags, System::Object ^ punkObject, System::Runtime::InteropServices::UCOMIMoniker ^ pmkObjectName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % pdwRegister);

param.name: grfFlags
param.span: Especifica si la referencia de la Tabla de objetos en ejecución (ROT) a punkObject es fuerte o débil, y controla el acceso al objeto mediante su entrada en la tabla ROT.

span.span: Specifies whether the Running Object Table's (ROT) reference to punkObject is weak or strong, and controls access to the object through its entry in the ROT.

param.name: punkObject
param.span: Referencia al objeto que se va a registrar como en ejecución.

span.span: Reference to the object being registered as running.

param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: Referencia al moniker que identifica punkObject.

span.span: Reference to the moniker that identifies punkObject.

param.name: pdwRegister
param.span: Referencia a un valor de 32 bits que puede utilizarse para identificar esta entrada de la tabla ROT en llamadas posteriores a o .

span.span: Reference to a 32-bit value that can be used to identify this ROT entry in subsequent calls to or .

summary.span: Registra que el objeto suministrado ha entrado en estado de ejecución.

span.span: Registers that the supplied object has entered the running state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IRunningObjectTable::Register` en MSDN library.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IRunningObjectTable::Register` in the MSDN library.
